item.title: Intuition Hyperbolische Metrik
item.description: A good way to imagine [[The_Beautiful_Story_of_Non-Euclidean_Geometry|hyperbolic space]] is this: in the middle you have a special height. And the further you go to the “boundary” the smaller you get.

item.title: The Beautiful Story of Non-Euclidean Geometry
item.description: YouTube-Video über hyperbolische Geometrie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yoGJKW2CjVA Geogebra-Applet für das Kreisscheibenmodell von Poincaré: https://www.geogebra.org/classic/sxakwtrr
